death.fell.forgivingvoid: %1$s fell from the top of the world
forgivingvoid.configuration.damageOnFall: The amount of damage applied to the player when they land.
forgivingvoid.configuration.dimensionAll: List of dimension ids to be allowed for Forgiving Void. Options triggerInOverworld etc. take priority.
forgivingvoid.configuration.dimensionDen: List of additional dimension ids to be deny-listed from Forgiving Void. Options triggerInOverworld etc. take priority. Ignored if dimensionAllowList is set.
forgivingvoid.configuration.disableVanil: Set to true if players are rubber-banding while falling through the void. If you're hosting a public server, you should only do this if you have proper anti-cheat installed.
forgivingvoid.configuration.fallingHeigh: The height from which the player will be falling after falling through the void.
forgivingvoid.configuration.preventDeath: Prevent death on void fall (limits damage to leave at least 0.5 hearts)
forgivingvoid.configuration.title: Forgiving Void
forgivingvoid.configuration.triggerAtDis: The distance to the minimum y level at which Forgiving Void should forgive the player and send them towards the sky.
forgivingvoid.configuration.triggerInEnd: Set to false to make Forgiving Void not trigger in the end void (dimension 1).
forgivingvoid.configuration.triggerInNet: Set to false to make Forgiving Void not trigger in the nether void (dimension -1).
forgivingvoid.configuration.triggerInOve: Set to false to make Forgiving Void not trigger in the overworld void (dimension 0).
